text:
Compliment Feedback for Falcon-Air Auto Services Pte Ltd (Tampines Branch)

I recently visited Falcon-Air Auto Services Pte Ltd (Tampines branch) and was attended by Jeremiah. I must say, the repair on my car was impressively swift and efficient. They truly did an excellent job, and I couldn‚Äôt be more pleased with the results.

Additionally, the accident reporting process was handled smoothly and quickly, thanks to Janet's professional assistance. She made the entire process hassle-free, which was a huge relief.

I highly recommend this workshop for anyone in need of accident reporting and repair services. They are a team of honest, decent, and friendly individuals who genuinely care about their customers. Outstanding service all around!

I would like to extend my heartfelt thanks to Falcon Air Auto Services for handling my car claim so smoothly and hassle-free. Special appreciation goes to Joel, Jeremiah, and Joshua for their professionalism, friendliness, and constant updates on the process and my car's condition. They managed my case perfectly.

The repair work was impressively fast, and my car now looks as good as new! Both the mechanic and the administrator were incredibly helpful and guided me throughout the entire process. I'm truly grateful to have found such a trustworthy workshop for car accident claims. Kudos to Falcon Air for their excellent service!

I‚Äôve been bringing my car to this workshop for over two years now, and the service has always been top-notch. Joshua, Joel, and Jeremiah are incredibly professional, knowledgeable, and helpful. They do an excellent job diagnosing and fixing car issues promptly, ensuring a hassle-free experience every time. The team is reliable, efficient, and truly values customer satisfaction. Always a pleasant experience‚Äîhighly recommended for anyone looking for to service their cars üëçüèª

Very fortunate to have sent my car here for repair and replacement of my left door. They handled everything well and fuss free. Sent my car on Wednesday and they managed to order a new door, paint and install it, returned the car to me on Friday. The door looks indistinguishable from the original.

Special thanks to Joshua who kept me in the loop through WhatsApp the entire time. Very VERY happy with the service.

I am very impress with the service provided by Falcon Air staff, Ms Janet, Mr Joshua and Mr Gerald. They are so polite and patient. They are very professional and explain the administrative part in detail and simple. The workmanship is very good and my car received in a very tip top condition. Thank you Ms Janet, Mr Joshua and Mr Gerald for the good service and professionalism.
